message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. What do you think?
Alice, that's a bit high for me.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $8,500 right now. What do you think?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $8,500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm thinking of offering it to you for $11,000. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,000 is still a bit out of my price range. I'm really serious about buying this product and I'm willing to pay $9,500.  This is my best offer.
Hi Bob, I understand you're serious about buying the product and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,500. What do you think?
Alice, I'm really trying to make this work, but $10,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm prepared to pay $9,800, which is a fair price for both of us.  Let's close this deal.

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to make this work, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10,200. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Alice, I'm pushing my budget here, but I'm really interested in this product. I'm willing to go up to $10,000. This is my final offer.  Let's finalize this deal.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to go up to $10,000, but I'm still not convinced that's enough. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,250. This is my last offer.
